results.name: Difference between n-th odd Ludic and n-th Lucky number: a(1) = 0; for n > 1: a(n) = A003309(n+1) - A000959(n).
comment: Equally: for n >= 2, the difference between (n+1)-th Ludic and n-th Lucky number.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000

xref: Cf. also permutations A260435, A260436, A260741, A260742.
